messages: Brad: Phone, wallet, keypass... Phone, wallet, keypass..
Brad: ...Phone, wallet... Oh, it's Alan's ex-girlfriend... I feel so bad for her...
(Whoah, whoah, I don't remember doing anything that awful last night to deserve this! Passing out was an accident!)
Brad: ...If only I could do something to cheer her up... Oh right, my wallet...
(Okay, sure, ignore me. You beef jerky.)
